---
agent: Instructions Generator Agent
---
Take the information below and generate an agent instructions .md file for it in the /docs directory. If a .md filemane is provided, use that, ortherwise generate an appropriate filename based on the content. Make sure the instructions are concise and not too long. Make sure to update the AGENTS.md file to reference the new instructions file. If no information is provided below, prompt the user to give the necessary details about the layer of architecture or coding standards to documment.
